entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, mentioned as wanting to warm up his feet and asking about Moaning Myrtle.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: A friend of Harry's, mentioned as being nervous and suggesting caution when walking through the ghosts.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Another friend of Harry's, mentioned as stopping abruptly to avoid talking to Moaning Myrtle.

entities.name: moaning myrtle
entities.description: A ghost who haunts the girls' toilet on the first floor, mentioned by Hermione as someone they don't want to talk to.

entities.name: fat friar
entities.description: A cheerful Hufflepuff ghost, mentioned as talking to a knight with an arrow sticking out of his forehead.

entities.name: bloody baron
entities.description: A gaunt, staring Slytherin ghost covered in silver bloodstains, given a wide berth by the other ghosts.

entities.name: knight
entities.description: A knight with an arrow sticking out of his forehead, mentioned as talking to the Fat Friar.

entities.name: nuns
entities.description: A group of gloomy nuns, mentioned as being present on the dance floor.

entities.name: ragged man
entities.description: A ragged man wearing chains, mentioned as being present on the dance floor.

relationships.description: Harry is aware of Moaning Myrtle's presence and haunts.
Hermione is also aware of Moaning Myrtle's presence and haunts.
Harry sees the Fat Friar talking to a knight with an arrow sticking out of his forehead.
Hermione is afraid of Moaning Myrtle and wants to avoid her.
The Bloody Baron is given a wide berth by the other ghosts due to his intimidating appearance.
